| HistoryText             = The Skrull Slavers were the most feared slave ring in the galaxy. They possessed the technology to miniaturize humans to the size of action figure dolls and a modular starship whose components could separate and marge. The adolescent [[New Mutants (Earth-616)|New Mutants]] encountered them in the state of [[Kentucky (State)|Kentucky]] where their operation was disguised as a carnival. It was kidnapping humans to sell into intergalactic slavery.{{r|New Mutants Vol 1 92}}
